QuestData.Title: Environmental Awareness
QuestData.Description: Have you ever smelled submarine fuel, $n? It's nasty stuff. Unfortunately, we need to burn huge amounts of it to get the Verne to move, and it's both bad-smelling AND deadly to the local wildlife. We need to be more environmentally conscious.$b$bThe sea creatures nearby have particularly oily flesh. Take this device up to Seabrush - just above this cave - and use it on the corpses of terrapins, remoras, and hammerhead sharks. Their oil might save the lives of hundreds of other sea creatures.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Oil Extrusion Pump on the corpses of Seabrush Terrapins, Scourgut Remoras, and Spinescale Hammerheads in Seabrush to obtain 4 Terrapin Oil, 4 Remora Oil, and 4 Hammerhead Oil.
QuestData.CompletionText: Please... don't tell the other goblins that I'm an environmentalist! I don't think I can take the mocking!
QuestData.RewardText: <Fiasco sticks a finger into each sample and sniffs it.>$b$bYes, I think this will do.
